system.description:
The ability to sing, play musical instruments, and compose new music. 
Specialties: sing, compose, any one instrument. (General) 66 (ORGANIZATION) LORE* Knowledge of the legends, history, struc ture, operation, and goals of the specified organization. Organizations can be as large as the Church, or as small as a local craft guild. The smaller the organization, the more detailed your knowledge. 
Specialties: personalities, history, politics. (General)
